channel.title: FortiGuard Labs | FortiGuard Center - IR Advisories
channel.description: The following is a list of advisories for issues resolved in Fortinet products. The resolution of such issues is coordinated by the Fortinet Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT), a dedicated, global team that manages the receipt, investigation, and public reporting of information about security vulnerabilities and issues related to Fortinet products and services.

item.title: FortiADC - Command injection in Automation/Webhook module
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command vulnerability [CWE-78]Â in the management interface of FortiADC may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized commands via specifically crafted arguments to existing commands.
